# tmuxr

The `tmuxr` package allows you to control [tmux](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/wiki) from R. 

### Installation

You can install `tmuxr` from GitHub with:

```R
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("datascienceworkshops/tmuxr")
```
